events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item arrived with multiple scratches and a broken screen which makes it unusable.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect due to damage and broken parts on arrival.
Your case has been assigned to a customer support agent who will assist you shortly.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue you experienced with your item. I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and broken screen so we can assess the damage more accurately?
I have attached the photos showing the damaged screen and scratches. The item looks seriously faulty and unusable.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit sent via expedited shipping or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement sent as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and helpful options.
We have processed your replacement order. You will receive tracking details shortly, and the faulty product will be collected for return.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement product and that it arrived in perfect condition.
Since you confirmed all is well with your replacement, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a brief survey about your support experience to help us improve our service.
